post_title: Does Riga know how to rock?

comments.author: CornelisGerard
comments.body: OP: I'm a London based musician that likes to explore the local music scene in other countries. This is a short vlog in which I explore the city and check out some live music.

comments.author: Loopbloc
comments.body: Sweet video. Did you try to gig down the corner ? The music scene in Riga is pretty nice.

comments.author: IvanTheHobbit
comments.body: Did you check out DJ Krankenwagen? Despite the name itâ€™s a Riga based Band ðŸ˜…

comments.author: CornelisGerard
comments.body: No, but I will be back again in the future because I found a venue that said I could perform there.

comments.author: CornelisGerard
comments.body: No, but thanks for the recommendation!
